info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:54PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas and southwestern Pueblo Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 353 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Walsenburg to 8 miles north of La Veta. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. There is also a Flash Flood Warning in effect to the west, for the Spring Burn Scar. Locations impacted include... Eastern Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160, Walsenburg and La Veta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
